thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: White House Infrastructure Plan Faces Hurdles Funding Airport Modernization

author: Andy Pasztor
title: White House Infrastructure Plan Faces Hurdles Funding Airport Modernization
text:
President Donald Trump’s infrastructure plan promises few immediate benefits for U.S. airports and airlines, primarily because current aviation laws block many types of public-private projects envisioned by White House officials.
Mr. Trump’s initiative anticipates that roughly $100 billion in federal grants over a decade will generate several times that much in state and local funds to build new roads, bridges, waterways and other big-ticket projects.
...
